title: Can I make dua to remove boyfriend from friend's mind & life or is it breaking ties? assim al hakeem
transcript: um my best friend is in relationship with a guy the guy is really bad and also characterless but she's in love with him and can't leave him and I can't leave her alone as she's like my sister so can I make do to Allah that remove the boy from her mind and life and remove uh her from the boy's mind and life or will it be breaking ties can I make this specific Dua yes you can make that Dua inshallah without any problem
